name: StreetRumble
description:
Hi!

We did this project in 2019 at Sheffield Hallam University. We had the task to create a videogame for the play station platform in about 4 months and so we did. Later I realized we never published that game anywhere so here it is :)

This game is a platform shooter inspired in Smash Bros and Duck Game with quick action and a lot of weapons to play with. You can even use the defeated bodies of your friends as weapons :D! Throwing a Ragdoll Grandma can be as deadly as a black hole in this game. Its a really simple project but he had a lot of fun playing it in the development

  • Controls (XBOX gamepad):
    • Right Trigger to shoot your weapon or swing a ragdoll or hammer
    • X to throw your weapon. Some weapons are just small and will make other players drop their weapons, others, like hammers or grandmas, are heavy enough to kill them.
    • Left Thumbstick to move
    • A to jump. You can jump over other players to force them to drop their weapons.
    • You can jump down in some platforms to fall to the next platform below it
